title: PRs Merged With vs Without Prow E2E

list.name: repo_id
list.label: Repo
list.definition: select concat(name, '--', id) as text from repos where id like 'github%'
list.query: select concat(name, '--', id) as text from repos where id like 'github%'

list.name: base_ref
list.label: Merge Target Branch
list.definition: select distinct base_ref from pull_requests where base_ref is not null and base_ref != '' order by base_ref
list.query: select distinct base_ref from pull_requests where base_ref is not null and base_ref != '' order by base_ref

list.name: bot_accounts
list.label: Exclude Bot Accounts
list.description: Comma-separated GitHub logins to exclude from PR author (leave blank for none).

list.name: bot_author_ids
list.label: Exclude Bot Author IDs
list.description: Comma-separated author_id values to exclude (leave blank for none).

list.name: exclude_merged_by_ids
list.label: Exclude Merged By IDs
list.description: Comma-separated merged_by_id values to exclude (leave blank for none).

list.name: e2e_pattern
list.label: E2E Job Name Contains
list.description: Case-insensitive substring match on OpenShift CI job_name.

options.content:
## Purpose
Compare merged PRs with and without a passing Prow E2E job for the selected repositories, time range, and merge target branches.

## How it works
- Collects merged PRs for the selected repos/branches/time range.
- Matches PR commits to OpenShift CI jobs (`ci_test_jobs`) by commit SHA and repo/org.
- Classifies outcomes: passing jobs -> **Merged with E2E passing**; no passing job -> **Merged without E2E passing**.
- Exclusions by bot login/author id/merged-by id only affect the **Merged without E2E passing** bucket and table.

## Filters
Repo, merge target branch, E2E job name substring, and optional exclusions by bot login, author id, or merged-by id.

## Drilldowns
Click a bar to open the detailed PR table. Passing PRs include a Prow job link when available.

targets.rawSql:
WITH merged_prs AS (
  SELECT pr.id, pr.url, pr.title, pr.merged_date, pr.author_name, pr.author_id, pr.merged_by_id, r.name AS repo_name
  FROM lake.pull_requests pr
  INNER JOIN lake.repos r
    ON r.id = pr.base_repo_id
  WHERE pr.merged_date IS NOT NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
    AND pr.base_repo_id IN (${repo_id})
    AND pr.base_ref REGEXP '${base_ref:regex}'
),
pr_commits AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT pr.id AS pr_id, prc.commit_sha
  FROM merged_prs pr
  INNER JOIN lake.pull_request_commits prc
    ON prc.pull_request_id = pr.id
),
pr_e2e AS (
  SELECT pc.pr_id,
         MAX(CASE WHEN j.result = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_passing_e2e
  FROM pr_commits pc
  INNER JOIN merged_prs pr
    ON pr.id = pc.pr_id
  INNER JOIN lake.ci_test_jobs j
    ON j.commit_sha = pc.commit_sha
   AND j.job_type = 'prow'
   AND j.organization = SUBSTRING_INDEX(pr.repo_name, '/', 1)
   AND j.repository = SUBSTRING_INDEX(pr.repo_name, '/', -1)
  WHERE LOWER(j.job_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER('$e2e_pattern'), '%')
  GROUP BY pc.pr_id
)
SELECT
  'Count' AS bucket,
  SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(pe.has_passing_e2e, 0) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS `Merged with E2E passing`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(pe.has_passing_e2e, 0) = 0
           AND ('$bot_accounts' = '' OR FIND_IN_SET(LOWER(pr.author_name), LOWER(REPLACE('$bot_accounts', ' ', ''))) = 0)
           AND ('$bot_author_ids' = '' OR FIND_IN_SET(LOWER(pr.author_id), LOWER(REPLACE('$bot_author_ids', ' ', ''))) = 0)
           AND ('$exclude_merged_by_ids' = '' OR FIND_IN_SET(LOWER(pr.merged_by_id), LOWER(REPLACE('$exclude_merged_by_ids', ' ', ''))) = 0)
      THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS `Merged without E2E passing`
FROM merged_prs pr
LEFT JOIN pr_e2e pe
  ON pe.pr_id = pr.id;

WITH merged_prs AS (
  SELECT pr.id, pr.url, pr.title, pr.merged_date, pr.author_name, pr.author_id, pr.merged_by_id, r.name AS repo_name
  FROM lake.pull_requests pr
  INNER JOIN lake.repos r
    ON r.id = pr.base_repo_id
  WHERE pr.merged_date IS NOT NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
    AND pr.base_repo_id IN (${repo_id})
    AND pr.base_ref REGEXP '${base_ref:regex}'
),
pr_commits AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT pr.id AS pr_id, prc.commit_sha
  FROM merged_prs pr
  INNER JOIN lake.pull_request_commits prc
    ON prc.pull_request_id = pr.id
),
pr_e2e AS (
  SELECT pc.pr_id,
         MAX(CASE WHEN j.result = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_passing_e2e,
         SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN j.result = 'SUCCESS' THEN j.view_url END ORDER BY j.finished_at DESC), ',', 1) AS prow_job_url
  FROM pr_commits pc
  INNER JOIN merged_prs pr
    ON pr.id = pc.pr_id
  INNER JOIN lake.ci_test_jobs j
    ON j.commit_sha = pc.commit_sha
   AND j.job_type = 'prow'
   AND j.organization = SUBSTRING_INDEX(pr.repo_name, '/', 1)
   AND j.repository = SUBSTRING_INDEX(pr.repo_name, '/', -1)
  WHERE LOWER(j.job_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER('$e2e_pattern'), '%')
  GROUP BY pc.pr_id
),
pr_outcome AS (
  SELECT pr.id, pr.url, pr.title, pr.merged_date, pe.prow_job_url,
         CASE
           WHEN pe.has_passing_e2e = 1 THEN 'Merged with E2E passing'
           ELSE 'Merged without E2E passing'
         END AS e2e_outcome
  FROM merged_prs pr
  LEFT JOIN pr_e2e pe
    ON pe.pr_id = pr.id
)
SELECT title, url AS pr_url, merged_date, e2e_outcome, prow_job_url
FROM pr_outcome
WHERE e2e_outcome = 'Merged with E2E passing'
ORDER BY merged_date DESC
LIMIT 200;

WITH merged_prs AS (
  SELECT pr.id, pr.url, pr.title, pr.merged_date, pr.author_name, pr.author_id, pr.merged_by_id, r.name AS repo_name
  FROM lake.pull_requests pr
  INNER JOIN lake.repos r
    ON r.id = pr.base_repo_id
  WHERE pr.merged_date IS NOT NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
    AND pr.base_repo_id IN (${repo_id})
    AND pr.base_ref REGEXP '${base_ref:regex}'
),
pr_commits AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT pr.id AS pr_id, prc.commit_sha
  FROM merged_prs pr
  INNER JOIN lake.pull_request_commits prc
    ON prc.pull_request_id = pr.id
),
pr_e2e AS (
  SELECT pc.pr_id,
         MAX(CASE WHEN j.result = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_passing_e2e
  FROM pr_commits pc
  INNER JOIN merged_prs pr
    ON pr.id = pc.pr_id
  INNER JOIN lake.ci_test_jobs j
    ON j.commit_sha = pc.commit_sha
   AND j.job_type = 'prow'
   AND j.organization = SUBSTRING_INDEX(pr.repo_name, '/', 1)
   AND j.repository = SUBSTRING_INDEX(pr.repo_name, '/', -1)
  WHERE LOWER(j.job_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER('$e2e_pattern'), '%')
  GROUP BY pc.pr_id
),
pr_outcome AS (
  SELECT pr.id, pr.url, pr.title, pr.merged_date, pr.author_name, pr.author_id, pr.merged_by_id,
         CASE
           WHEN pe.has_passing_e2e = 1 THEN 'Merged with E2E passing'
           ELSE 'Merged without E2E passing'
         END AS e2e_outcome
  FROM merged_prs pr
  LEFT JOIN pr_e2e pe
    ON pe.pr_id = pr.id
)
SELECT title, url AS pr_url, merged_date, e2e_outcome
FROM pr_outcome
WHERE e2e_outcome = 'Merged without E2E passing'
  AND ('$bot_accounts' = '' OR FIND_IN_SET(LOWER(pr_outcome.author_name), LOWER(REPLACE('$bot_accounts', ' ', ''))) = 0)
  AND ('$bot_author_ids' = '' OR FIND_IN_SET(LOWER(pr_outcome.author_id), LOWER(REPLACE('$bot_author_ids', ' ', ''))) = 0)
  AND ('$exclude_merged_by_ids' = '' OR FIND_IN_SET(LOWER(pr_outcome.merged_by_id), LOWER(REPLACE('$exclude_merged_by_ids', ' ', ''))) = 0)
ORDER BY merged_date DESC
LIMIT 200;
